body.name: GRACE KARIN Women's 2024 Summer Boho Floral Dress Casual V Neck Short Flutter Sleeve Dress Flowy Pleated Beach Dress
features: 【Features】This summer floral maxi dress features v-neckline, short flutter sleeve, elastic ruffle trim details, pleated flared a-line hem, a must-have for comfortable easy everyday outfits!
【Match】This spring bohemian dress for women is a versatile maxi dress, match with necklace, earrings, sunglasses, sunhats, clutches, heels, and wedges for a charming look.
【Occasions】This long flowy dress can be worn to work, church, park, walk, out to lunch with friends, to the movies, just about anywhere you would like.
【Material】The floral print boho dress is mainly made from breathable and skin friendly fabric, great for everyday wear, family gatherings, holidays, weddings.
【Size Guide】Please refer to size chart we provided in the pictures (Not Amazon size chart) before buying this casual flowy maxi dresses. Hand wash or put into a laundry bag for gentle machine wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect spring dress!
reviews.reviewText: The Grace Karin floral print V-neck dress is really pretty on! It is a loose fitting long maxi skirt with delicate pleating along the sleeves and hemline. It’s airy and floaty - it literally just emanates springtime beauty.It has the typical Grace Karin qualities - excellent fabric, strong seams and stitching and - wonderfully affordable! Is my ‘go to’ brand when I need something classy to wear. I love it.The dress is lined, however, it still has the easy care instructions on the label. I machine washed mine on delicate and hung it to dry. It seems almost true to size, but it is pretty loose on me. If you want a more fitted look, you might choose to size down.This is a fabulous springtime dress. I hope it works out just as well for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars In between? Size down!
reviews.reviewText: Amazon suggested I was a medium but I measured in between the sizes, so I ordered a large. (I’m 6’7, 165lbs) I do think I could have fit in a medium, but the elastic band is snug on me so I don’t mind it being a little on the bigger size. It does look a bit old lady-ish on me, but I’m not sure if that’s the print or the dress being a little too big. I mostly like it! The quality is good. It’s not see though, the fabric is thicker than expected. I’m not sure I’d pay $40 bucks for another one, but if you can catch this on a sale, it could be worth it! I got it for work and it’s comfy, so I’m happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful summer dress!
reviews.reviewText: I loved the pattern of the material that this dress is made from. It did not disappoint when it arrived. The material is soft and flowy. The colors are beautiful. The stitching is even. The short flutter sleeves are fashionable and complementary. The blue and green color combination remind me of the ocean. The pleated skirt does not add bulk but allows the skirt to swing and flow. I do not like to wear a slip. The skirt has a knee legenth built in slip and the bottom section lets your legs show through. This is very attractive. The dress fits according to size. I can't wait for warm weather to wear this dress. I haven't bought an Easter dress in years but this dress will be my Easter dress this year!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful material, not the most flattering for all body types
reviews.reviewText: This dress is lovely! The print (we got the blue and pink flowers) is very pretty, feminine, and complimentary. The cut is very nice as well. The only issue I have with the dress is that I am a little bit overweight and the skirt seems to add 10 pounds to me because it is accordian-like with creases. Other than that, I love the neckline and longer sleeves. I wear dresses and skirts all the time and I really feel like a beautiful creation of God and get a lot of respect from men. A dress like this is so pretty and would help a woman feel wonderful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, double layers
reviews.reviewText: This dress has really soft and pretty pink and white colors that look neutral and lovely. The length is beautiful, and the double layer design makes me think more “church-like” feelings. But it’s soft and comfortable, and the band around the waist brings it in snug and gives the dress some dimensional shape. Overall it’s a very modest and cute option!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: GRACE KARIN Women's 2024 Summer Boho Floral Dress Casual V Neck Short Flutter Sleeve Dress Flowy Pleated Beach DressThis is a cute and well fitting dress. The fabric is soft and has a lovely drape. The print is lovely. Would be better with pockets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Pleated Summer Dress
reviews.reviewText: This flowing flutter sleeve, V-neck, pleated summer dress is tea length and very lovely. The outer layer is light and airy fabric that is lined. The dress would be perfect for any occasion. Trust me, you will look great in it. 😍 The fabric and stitching are great, and it will feel so good on. Highly Recommended 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Fits to Size, Comfortable to Wear, Lightweight
reviews.reviewText: This Cute Floral Summer Dress came well-packaged and fits to Size. It’s comfortable to wear. This Dress is made from good Quality, lightweight Material and appears to be durable. I like the Ruffles on the Sleeves and the Liner under the Skirt to prevent it from being see-through. I also like the Length of the Dress. The Pleated Waist fits a Bit above my Waist. Nonetheless, this Dress looks very cute; and I look forward to wearing it this Summer.
